ProteinName	Zinc finger protein 143 (SPH-binding factor) (Selenocysteine tRNA gene transcription-activating factor) (hStaf)
GeneName	ZNF143 SBF STAF
Length	637
Function	Transcriptional activator. Activates the gene for selenocysteine tRNA (tRNAsec). Binds to the SPH motif of small nuclear RNA (snRNA) gene promoters. Participates in efficient U6 RNA polymerase III transcription via its interaction with CHD8. In complex with HCFC1 and ZNF143, regulates the expression of several genes, including AP2S1, ESCO2, OPHN1, RBL1, UBXN8 and ZNF32 (PubMed:26416877).
